application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 Common lime tree - Pollard to 9m height 12m & spread 5m Reduce height to 9m & spread to 3mT2  Flowering cherry tree - Crown reduction by approximately 1.5m  height 6m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 4.5m & spread to 4mG3 Sycamore tree x4  - Reduce height to around 2m above the boatyard roof, cut back to give 4m clearance from nos. 7, 8 and 9 Aquarius and remove ivy to bottom of gutter, Group of sycamores and silver birch tree (G3 on plan) - Reduce height by 3m Silver birch tree - Cut back to give 4m clearance from nos. 7, 8 and 9 Aquariusheight 12m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 10m & spread to 3mT5 Sycamore tree - Remove ivy up to 1m from ground level height 12m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 10m & spread to 3mT10 Cotoneaster tree - Fell to ground level, grind out stumpheight 4m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 10m & spread to 0mT11 Quince tree - Crown reduction by approximately 1.5mheight 5m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 3.5m & spread to 3.5mT12 Apple tree - Crown reduction by approximately 1.5mheight 5m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 3.5m & spread to 3.5mT13 Fig tree - Reduce height by 2mheight 5m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 3.5m & spread to 3.5m
